The claim states that 95: of applicants received an offer at one of their top three preferred schools last year.
The Department for Education spokesperso: 3. The figure of 95% receiving an offer at a top three preferred school has fallen slightly over the last two years, from a high of 96.5% in 2013/14.
The fact that 15: of state-funded secondary schools in England were at or over capacity in 2014 raises questions about the potential impact on future years' ability to accommodate applicants.
